value.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices
value.excerpt: The reliability of your systems, services and products has a direct impact on your success. Learn the modern operations principles and practices (and the Azure features that support them) that will help you achieve the level of reliability you need.

topItems.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: An introduction
topItems.excerpt: Discover a map for navigating reliability challenges and sustainably achieving the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

topItems.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: Monitoring
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use monitoring to help you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

topItems.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: Incident response
topItems.excerpt: Learn the incident response fundamentals necessary to help you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

topItems.title: Improve your reliability with modern operations practices: Learning from failure
topItems.excerpt: Learn about post-incident reviews, a practice necessary to help you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

value.title: Automate Azure tasks using scripts with PowerShell
value.excerpt: Learn how to install Azure PowerShell on Linux, macOS, or Windows and then connect to Azure and manage your resources.

value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway
value.excerpt: Learn about the virtual private network (VPN) gateway options in Azure and typical scenarios for using a VPN. Create and test VPNs to securely connect sites to Azure.

value.title: Detect language with the text analytics API
value.excerpt: Language detection is useful for content stores that collect arbitrary text, where language is unknown. You can parse the results of this analysis to determine which language is used in the input document.

value.title: Implement CI/CD for IoT Edge
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Embrace Zero Trust with Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about the Zero Trust model and how to implement Zero Trust into your organization.

value.title: Recognize and synthesize speech
value.excerpt: Learn how to recognize and synthesize speech by using Azure Cognitive Services.

value.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
value.excerpt: Explore the options for Azure disk encryption to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new virtual machines.

value.title: Build applications with Azure DevOps
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how to collaborate with others to continuously build, test, and verify your applications using Azure Pipelines and GitHub.

topItems.title: Create a build pipeline with Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Set up a continuous integration (CI) pipeline that automates the process of building your application.

topItems.title: Implement a code workflow in your build pipeline by using Git and GitHub
topItems.excerpt: Learn along with the Space Game web team the benefits of collaboration through Visual Studio Code and GitHub.

topItems.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
topItems.excerpt: Find out about automated testing that proves your code to be maintainable, understandable, and functioning without repetitive manual testing.

topItems.title: Manage build dependencies with Azure Artifacts
topItems.excerpt: In this module, the Space Game web team guides you through creating a build pipeline that produces a package that can be used by multiple applications.

value.title: Build the intelligent edge with Azure IoT Edge
value.excerpt: Follow this learning path for a broad and compelling introduction to the fundamentals of building IoT solutions with Azure IoT.

topItems.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device
Set up an IoT Edge Gateway
topItems.excerpt: This module is theoretical and will walk you through how an IoT Edge device can be used as a gateway.

value.title: Evolve your DevOps practices
value.excerpt: In this learning path, find out how Azure DevOps enables transparency and cooperation with continuous delivery and deployment for your development lifecycle.

topItems.title: Assess your existing software development process
topItems.excerpt: Find out how to assess efficiency with a value stream map to help you examine your existing release processes and technologies.

topItems.title: Get started with Azure DevOps
topItems.excerpt: Explore Azure DevOps capabilities and get started setting up your own organization knowing what separates elite performers from low performers.

topItems.title: Choose an Agile approach to software development
topItems.excerpt: Learn with the Space Game web team how to use Azure Boards to implement Agile software practices along with DevOps transparency and collaboration.

topItems.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
topItems.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

value.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how using key principles throughout your cloud architecture can help you design and build a solid architectural foundation that you can continuously improve.

value.title: Deploy a pre-built module to the Edge device
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Develop secure IoT Solutions for Azure Sphere with IoT Hub
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Introduction to MLOps for IoT Edge
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Run Cognitive Services on IoT Edge
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Add basic conversational intelligence to your apps by using Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS)
value.excerpt: Learn to identify valuable information in conversations with LUIS for interpreting user goals (intents) and distill valuable information from sentences (entities).

value.title: Application and package management using Helm
value.excerpt: Helm is an application package manager for Kubernetes that you use to standardize and simplify the deployment of cloud-native applications on Kubernetes. Here you'll see how to install third-party packages called Helm charts and how to create and install Helm charts for the workloads your teams develop.

value.title: Classify and moderate text with Azure Content Moderator
value.excerpt: In this module, we'll introduce you to Azure Content Moderator and show how to use it for text moderation

value.title: Create security baselines
value.excerpt: Create security baselines

value.title: Connecting IoT devices to Cognitive Services using Azure Functions
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Discover how to create a Docker image and store it in the Azure Container Registry, then use Azure App Service to deploy a web application based on the image.

value.title: Image classification using Azure Sphere
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Implement a code workflow in your build pipeline by using Git and GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn along with the Space Game web team the benefits of collaboration through Visual Studio Code and GitHub.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Sphere
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Manage your Language Understanding Intelligent Service (LUIS) Apps
value.excerpt: Learn to manage LUIS apps through versioning, key management, handling data, and improving predictions.

value.title: Recognize entities in text with the text analytics API
value.excerpt: Identify and categorize entities in your text as people, places, organizations, date/time, quantities, percentages, currencies, and more.
